Summary: The 3 West Club is centrally located across the street from Rockefeller Center and with views of St. Patrick's Cathedral. It is close to many restaurants and within walking distance of the theater district.

The Roger Williams Hotel is located in Murray Hill, a quiet neighborhood within walking distance of many Midtown attractions like the Empire State Building and Grand Central Terminal, as well as subways for easy access to Central Park. Some reviewers mention quiet streets at night and being far enough from the Times Square "craziness".
Room Mate Grace is located in the heart of Manhattan near Times Square and is within walking distance of Central Park. The hotel has a gym, and some rooms have a view of the city.
The Royalton is located in Midtown Manhattan, within walking distance of Times Square, 5th Avenue, and Central Park. Some rooms have balconies.
The Salisbury Hotel is conveniently located near Central Park and has subway access, providing the best of both city and nature. The rooms are large and comfortable and some include kitchenettes.
The San Carlos is located in midtown Manhattan, within walking distance of Central Park and other attractions. Some rooms include a small kitchenette with a microwave and refrigerator.

Seafarers International House is located near Union Square, providing easy access to shops, restaurants, and the subway. It is also close to Union Square Park, which hosts a farmer's market on select days.

The Sheraton New York Hotel and Towers is located in midtown Manhattan, close to Times Square, Broadway, and Central Park, which is accessible by a short walk. It also has subway access to other parts of the city.

The Skyline Hotel is located a few blocks from Times Square and other attractions such as Broadway and Central Park, which are within walking distance. The hotel also has a rooftop indoor pool with views of the Manhattan skyline.

The Smyth Tribeca is located in downtown Manhattan, close to subway lines for easy access to the city, and within walking distance of the Brooklyn Bridge and Hudson River Park. It is also near shops, restaurants, cafes, and bars.

The Sofitel New York is located in midtown Manhattan, within walking distance of Times Square, Grand Central Station, and Central Park. Some rooms offer views of the Chrysler Building and the hotel is close to Bryant Park, providing an oasis of nature.

The Soho Grand is located in lower Manhattan, close to SoHo shopping, Little Italy, China Town, and the Financial District, and some rooms have city skyline views. There are some comments about the area being noisy.

The hotel is located in the Meatpacking District, near Greenwich Village and the West Village and has views of the river and skyline from the rooftop. It has a rooftop pool and is surrounded by bars, restaurants, and clubs.

The Stay Hotel is in Times Square, close to many subway and bus stops, a few blocks from fashionable 5th Ave and Central Park, and within walking distance to many attractions. There are also many restaurants and cafes right on the doorstep, and it is close to Rockefeller Center.

The Alex Hotel is located in midtown Manhattan, within walking distance of Grand Central Station, the Chrysler Building, and other key sights, but off the main strip, offering a quieter environment. Some reviewers noted views of the Chrysler building and other skyscrapers, while others appreciated the proximity to nearby parks and green spaces.

The Belvedere Hotel is in an excellent location within walking distance of Times Square, Broadway shows, Rockefeller Center, and Central Park. The hotel may be a good fit for someone looking to spend time in Midtown Manhattan and to also have access to some green space in Central Park.
The Benjamin is located in midtown Manhattan, allowing for easy access to shopping, restaurants, and attractions. Central Park is a 5-10 minute walk, with a subway station around the corner.

The Blakely Hotel is located in midtown Manhattan, within walking distance of Central Park, as well as shopping on 5th Avenue, the theater district, and Times Square. Subway access is nearby for travel to other parts of the city.

The Bowery Hotel has views overlooking a courtyard, garden, or the city, with some rooms having views of the Empire State Building and Chrysler Building; the location is within walking distance of SoHo and the East Village, and has easy access to the subway. Some rooms have windows that open.
The Bryant Park Hotel is centrally located in midtown Manhattan across from Bryant Park, offering a tranquil respite from the city. Rooms with park views are available, with some featuring balconies.

The Carlton on Madison is centrally located in Manhattan, near the 28th St. 4,5,6 subway stop, with easy access to Grand Central and points south such as Union Square and the Financial District, and within walking distance of Madison Square Park and Central Park. It is located in a quiet area, away from busy streets, and some rooms have views of a courtyard, while others face the Empire State Building.
The Carlyle is located in the Upper East Side, near Central Park, with views overlooking the park from some rooms. The hotel is within walking distance to museums and Madison Avenue boutiques.

The Franklin Hotel is located on the Upper East Side, close to the 4,5, and 6 subway lines and within walking distance of Central Park and the Metropolitan Museum of Art. It offers a complimentary European breakfast, evening wine and cheese, and access to a nearby gym.
The French Quarters Guest Apartments is located on Restaurant Row, close to Times Square, Broadway theaters, and within walking distance of Central Park. Some rooms have balconies and kitchenettes.

The Gem Hotel Chelsea is located in Chelsea, a safe and central Manhattan neighborhood, close to the Highline, a short walk to Chelsea's galleries, bookstores, and restaurants, and one block from the subway. The hotel is steps away from 8th Avenue and familiar shops, and some rooms may have street noise.

The hotel is located a 10-15 minute walk from Broadway and the Empire State Building, away from the busy areas, but close to a subway for city transport. There are restaurants nearby that are cheaper than Broadway.

The Gem Soho is located near a park and is within walking distance to downtown areas such as Little Italy and Chinatown, with easy access to the F and V subway lines. Some rooms have views of Sarah Roosevelt Park.

The Grant Hotel is located on the Upper West Side, less than two blocks from Broadway and about 3-4 blocks from Central Park and Riverside Park. The subway is 1.5-2 blocks away, with a 10-15 minute ride to Times Square.

The Hampton Inn Times Square North is located within walking distance of both Times Square and Central Park. Several reviews mention the convenience of having both city attractions and nature within easy reach.

The Helmsley Carlton House is located on the upper east side of Manhattan, one block from Central Park, and close to shopping and restaurants on Madison Avenue. Some rooms have kitchenettes and sitting areas.

The Helmsley Park Lane hotel is located across the street from Central Park, offering city and park views from its rooms; it is also near the subway and within walking distance of many attractions. Some rooms are old-fashioned, but clean and spacious.

The Herald Square Hotel is centrally located in midtown Manhattan, with easy access to subway stations, Times Square, Penn Station, Koreatown, Macy's, the Empire State Building, and other attractions, but some rooms can be noisy. The hotel offers basic, clean accommodations suitable for budget travelers, though some rooms are small, dark, and old-fashioned, while renovated rooms offer modern amenities like flat-screen TVs.

Hotel 91 is located in Manhattan's Chinatown, near the Manhattan Bridge, and within walking distance of the Brooklyn Bridge; it is also close to the Lower East Side, SoHo, and Little Italy. The hotel is near the East Broadway subway stop, which provides access to other parts of Manhattan and Brooklyn.

The Hotel at Times Square is centrally located, within walking distance of Central Park, as well as many attractions in midtown Manhattan, including Times Square, Rockefeller Center and 5th Avenue. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi, a fitness center, and a continental breakfast.
The Inn at Irving Place is located in Manhattan and offers a quiet environment. Some rooms have fireplaces, and guests have access to Gramercy Park.
The Iroquois is located in midtown Manhattan, close to Central Park, with convenient access to 5th Avenue and Grand Central Station. It is situated on a quiet street, providing a peaceful atmosphere.

The Jane Hotel is located in the West Village, near the Hudson River, with some rooms offering river and skyline views. It is close to the Meatpacking District and Greenwich Village, with easy access to the High Line Park and nearby restaurants and shops.
The Kimberly Hotel is centrally located in midtown Manhattan, within walking distance of Central Park, with subway access nearby. Some rooms have balconies with city views.
The Lombardy is located on 56th St between Park and Lex, within walking distance of Central Park. It is also close to shopping, restaurants, and the subway at 54th and Lex.

The London NYC is located in midtown Manhattan, within walking distance of Central Park, allowing guests to easily access both city attractions and natural spaces. Some rooms, particularly Vista Suites on higher floors, offer views overlooking Central Park.

The Lucerne is located on the Upper West Side, close to Central Park, museums, and Riverside Park, and a block or two from the subway, offering easy access to midtown. The area has a "neighborhoody" feel with shops and restaurants, providing a quieter, more residential experience compared to Times Square.
The Manhattan Club is centrally located between Times Square and Central Park, within walking distance of both, as well as Broadway and subway entrances. Some rooms have views of Central Park.

The Mansfield Hotel is centrally located in midtown Manhattan, within walking distance of Times Square, Grand Central Station, and Bryant Park. Some reviewers mention pleasant common areas such as a library and a bar with a "gentleman's club feel" and leather chairs.

The Marcel is located in the Gramercy Park/Flat Iron region, which is quieter than midtown but with as many attractions; it's near the subway, close to shops and restaurants, and an easy walk to the Flatiron building. Some rooms have views of the Empire State Building, and there's a rooftop terrace.
The Maritime Hotel is located near the Chelsea Market, Highline Park, and subway stations, offering access to various parts of the city. Some rooms have views of the Hudson River.

The Mark is located on the Upper East Side, near museums, art galleries, Central Park, and upscale shopping. It sits 150 yards from Central Park and is a five-minute walk to the Metropolitan Art Museum.

The Marmara Manhattan is located on the Upper East Side, near Central Park, museums, and subway stations, offering a residential feel with easy access to downtown attractions. Some reviewers mention views of the East River and the convenience of nearby restaurants and grocery stores.

The Mave Hotel is centrally located in midtown Manhattan, within walking distance of Madison Square Park and Union Square. It is also near subway stops for easy access to uptown and downtown attractions.
The Mercer is located in SoHo, close to subway connections, Equinox gym, and interesting shopping areas. Some rooms overlook a bamboo courtyard.

The Michelangelo Hotel is centrally located in Midtown Manhattan, close to Times Square, Broadway, and Rockefeller Center, and within walking distance of Central Park. Some reviewers noted the ability to walk to Central Park, while also being steps away from the Theater District.

The Milburn Hotel is located on the Upper West Side, a few blocks from Central Park and Riverside Park, and close to subway stations for easy access to the rest of the city. It is in a safe, residential neighborhood with grocery stores, restaurants, and delis nearby.
The Muse Hotel is located just off Times Square, providing both a central city location and a quieter environment away from the crowds. Some rooms offer views of the church and street.

The New York Helmsley is located centrally, within walking distance of Grand Central Station, Times Square, and Central Park. Some rooms offer views of the Chrysler Building and Empire State Building.

The New Yorker Hotel is centrally located near Penn Station, Madison Square Garden, Macy's, and multiple subway lines, providing easy access to various parts of the city, though it is not specifically near nature. Reviews mention that Central Park and the Hudson River are within walking distance or accessible by subway.
The Pierre is located across from Central Park, offering convenient access to nature. It's also near Fifth Avenue shopping and other city attractions, accessible by a cheap cab ride.

The Plaza Hotel is located at the south end of Central Park on 5th Ave, equidistant between the Guggenheim, the Metropolitan Museum, MoMA, and Broadway theatres. The hotel pays for water and fruit for early morning runners between 6 and 8 am.
The Pod Hotel is in Midtown East, with some reviews mentioning it's within walking distance of Central Park. The hotel also has a roof garden for city views and a nearby small park.
The Premier is located in Times Square, close to the theater district, and within walking distance of Central Park and the Empire State Building. Some rooms offer views of the Chrysler Building.
The Ritz Carlton Central Park is located across the street from Central Park and is within walking distance of shopping on 5th Avenue. Some rooms offer park views.
The Roosevelt is located in Midtown Manhattan near Grand Central Station and a short walk to Times Square, Rockefeller Center, and Central Park. The hotel is also close to the subway.
The Sherry-Netherland is located at 5th Ave and 59th, directly across from Central Park. Some suites offer expansive views of Central Park, and the hotel provides binoculars and a bird watching book.

The Shoreham Hotel is centrally located in midtown Manhattan, close to Central Park and within walking distance of various sites and subway stations for going further afield. Some rooms have balconies, and the hotel offers a fitness center.
The St. Regis is located between 5th Avenue and Madison, close to Central Park. Some rooms offer views of Central Park.

The Standard Hotel in the Meatpacking District is located above the High Line, an elevated park, and offers views of the Hudson River and the city. The hotel's location provides access to both the Meatpacking District's nightlife and the natural scenery of the High Line.

The Surrey is located on the Upper East Side, one block from Central Park, providing convenient access to both nature and the city. Some rooms include kitchenettes, and the hotel is near grocery stores and restaurants.

The Sylvan Guest House is located in Harlem, near a grocery store, and a short walk from the subway, including an express line to Manhattan. The guest house is located in a historical neighborhood, near the Jumel Mansion, and has a terrace.

The Time Hotel is located in the heart of the Theater District, just off Times Square, and within walking distance of Central Park. The hotel provides easy access to shopping, entertainment, and subway lines for exploring other parts of the city.
The hotel's location is in midtown Manhattan, near Central Park, with a subway station close by. Some rooms overlook Park Avenue.

The Westin New York at Times Square offers easy access to Central Park (15-20 minute walk) and views of the Hudson River from upper floors. It is conveniently located near the subway for access to other natural attractions like Madison Square Park.

Hotel Thirty Thirty is in midtown Manhattan, close to Park Avenue, subway lines, Grand Central Station, Empire State Building, and a walkable distance to Times Square and Central Park. The location allows access to restaurants, shops, cafes and sites in Manhattan.

The hotel is located in the Lower East Side, near SoHo, Chinatown, and the East Village, with easy access to the subway and within walking distance of many restaurants and bars. Rooms offer views of the Manhattan skyline, including the Empire State Building and Brooklyn Bridge.
The Travel Inn is within walking distance of the Hudson River, marina, and waterfront, offering access to circle cruises and river cruises. Some rooms have views of the pool.

The Tribeca Grand is located in a convenient area in walking distance to Soho, Chinatown and Little Italy and has free bicycles that can be borrowed. It is located in a quiet part of town, away from mid-town madness and close to cool neighborhoods.
The Trump International Hotel and Tower is located at Columbus Circle, right next to Central Park. Many rooms have views overlooking Central Park, and some rooms include kitchens.

The Tudor Hotel is located on the quieter east side of midtown Manhattan, close to the East River, with Tudor City parks nearby, but is still within walking distance of Grand Central Station and other attractions. The hotel is located on 42nd street, and provides bus access to destinations like Times Square.

The Avalon Vincci is centrally located in Manhattan near the Empire State Building and close to subway and bus lines. Some reviewers mention being able to walk to Central Park and other tourist attractions.

The W The Court is located in the Murray Hill neighborhood, which is described as residential and quieter than other parts of midtown, but is a short walk to the subway, Park Ave, Grand Central station, and restaurants. Some rooms have views of the Chrysler or Empire State Buildings.

The W Tuscany is located in the Murray Hill area of Midtown Manhattan, close to Grand Central Station, and offers a relatively quiet environment. The hotel is within walking distance of many sites and transportation hubs.
The W Times Square is in the heart of Times Square but is near Central Park. Some rooms offer views of the Hudson River.

The W Union Square is located directly across from Union Square, near a subway station, and diagonally across from the Union Square Greenmarket, which offers local produce and goodies. Some rooms offer views of Union Square and the location provides easy access to other parts of Manhattan.

The Waldorf Towers is centrally located in Manhattan, within walking distance of Broadway Theatres, Empire State Building, Times Square, and Central Park; some rooms have views of Park Avenue and the East River. Some reviewers mention the hotel's proximity to Central Park as a positive attribute.

The Wall Street Inn is located in the Financial District of Lower Manhattan, near subway stations providing access to midtown and other areas. It is close to Battery Park, the Staten Island Ferry, and some waterfront areas.

The Warwick Hotel is centrally located in midtown Manhattan, within walking distance of Central Park and other attractions, with subway lines nearby. Some rooms have views of Central Park and are quiet, but others face brick walls.

The Washington Jefferson Hotel is near Central Park and within walking distance of Times Square, Broadway, and many restaurants. It is located on a quiet street but has easy access to subway and bus lines.

The Washington Square Hotel is located in Greenwich Village, right next to Washington Square Park and near a subway station, offering a mix of city access and a park-side setting. Some rooms offer views of the park, and the hotel is within walking distance of various restaurants, shops, and attractions.

The Wellington Hotel is centrally located on 7th Avenue, with Central Park to the right and Times Square to the left, and some rooms have views of Central Park. A subway entrance is located next to the hotel, which is near Rockefeller Center and within walking distance of some museums.
The hotel is located in midtown Manhattan, next to Carnegie Hall and one block from Central Park. It is close to museums, Columbus Circle, Lincoln Center, and Times Square.
This hotel is within walking distance to Times Square and Central Park. There is a subway station on the corner to go to various locations such as Central Park.
I am sorry, but none of the reviews mention nature or outdoor activities. This hotel is centrally located in midtown Manhattan near the Empire State Building.

Woogo Central Park/Tempo Apartments is located on the Upper West Side, near Central Park and Riverside Park, with convenient access to the 72nd Street subway station. Some rooms feature rooftop terraces with skyline views.

The Wyndham Garden Hotel Times Square South has a tenth-floor terrace and a garden-themed restaurant that provide outdoor and natural settings. The hotel is also within walking distance of many attractions including Times Square, Central Park, and Penn Station.
